special_text:
[+2]: Create a 2/2 colorless Alien creature token with flying and “Whenever this creature attacks, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.”
[-3]: Each opponent may exile up to three cards from their hand. For each card less than three a player exiles this way, that player exiles a permanent they control.
[-12]: Target player searches their library for a card and reveals it. Exile all other cards from their library. [i](The revealed card remains as the final card.)[/i]
